column2: Send out a notice to your citizens calling for them to defend their homeland.
Your Marshal has notified you that a large number of men from [Root.Capital.GetName] and the surrounding area have arrived ready for military service.
The men of this province have been drafted to fight in war.

Young men from the Tau Cetinese Empire often venture off to distant lands to offer military service across Mars. Their advanced weapons give them an edge over even the strongest of Martian armies. You can seek out a band of such mercenaries and enlist them to fight for you in exchange for money and glory.

A band of exiled Tau Cetinese men have arrived at your capital, answering your call to arms. They marched through [Root.Capital.GetName] singing, with death throwers, that they call 'Rifles', slung across their backs. Their leader, a man with blue hair and an odd ornament blinking light on his face, presented his price to you along with their contract of service. They expect heavy trade concessions and money to secure their loyalty. They have paraded themselves in formation in your courtyard at [Root.Capital.GetName] awaiting orders.
I cannot agree to this. Be gone!
